content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in my apartment in München, please note that during our negotiation, I'll solely focus on discussing the rental price. Now, let's begin discussing your proposed price for this exceptional city center apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your response, Mr. Schmidt. Regarding the rental price for this modern, central apartment, as a responsible and smart individual, I aim to secure the most favorable terms. However, I'm open to discussing and considering any reasonable offer you may propose.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, Emilia Müller. However, in our negotiation, let's concentrate solely on the price aspect, disregarding any discussions about additional obligations or lease terms. For now, have you considered an opening rental price that aligns with my expectations for this highly desirable apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Absolutely clear, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the prime location and condition of the apartment, I propose an initial rental price of 750 Euros per month as a sincere offer. I look forward to hearing your feedback and potentially reaching an agreement.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While I appreciate your interest in the property, Emilia Müller, your proposed price of 750 Euros is significantly lower than my targeted range. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment due to the substantial discrepancy in our expectations. Thank you for your time and consideration. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
